snippet: Alfred Morris’s immediate success at the N.F.L. level may be a surprise, but those who have spent a lot of time with him knew he was ready.
abstract: Profile of Washington Redskins rookie running back Alfred Morris, who has quietly gathered 982 rushing yards and 6 touchdowns in his first 11 games; Morris is on pace to eclipse Clinton Portis' single-season team record of 1,516 rushing yards.
lead_paragraph: Alfred Morris’s immediate success at the N.F.L. level may be a surprise, but those who have spent a lot of time with him knew he was ready.

headline.seo: Redskins’ Alfred Morris Turns the Heads That Robert Griffin III Has Not
headline.main: Morris Turns Heads That Griffin III Hasn’t
headline.print_headline: Morris Turns Heads That Griffin Hasn’t
